TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sasug, title = Sasug, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sasug} }

S.FORM: Sasug Nasi mstrung ka uwa ni qrijil da, asi ka smipaq babuy ni msasug hiyi wawa mgay dadan, yasa Gaya ta seejiq ka nii.
